name: DEMO HIGH
description:
You're a new student at Demo High, transferring in the second half of your final year of high school. When you meet your science class, you find out there are only four of you! And your science teacher has decided now is the perfect time to assign a group project. You have until Friday to befriend one of your classmates, lest you get stuck with someone you don't know on an assignment that lasts the rest of the year!

Made for the 2023 My First Game Jam! In version 0.8, 1.0 is releasing on the fifteenth of March 2023!
